text: "One More Minute" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic in the style of doo-wop and Elvis. It is about how the singer would rather cause harm to himself rather than "spend one more minute" with his former girlfriend. It was released in his 1984 album Dare to be Stupid. ==References== Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:1985 songs
title: One More Minute
